Tassast
:
Tassast
deg
tesnimant
d
afray
(
aḥulfu
)
s
utmelli
d
wadad
d
tuẓẓma
.

Dɣa
isekna
n
tassast
mgaraden
neɣ
ugten
seg
s
ufray
s
temzalt
(
ṛṛwaḥ
)
n
tezmert
,
afray
s
uneẓmi
,
antuter
amatu
,
turnant
,
tunɣayt
,
Tawarrẓa
,
alluy
d
uɣelluy
n
wadad
n
yidammen
,
arfey
,
Anfa
,
imrayen
deg
unagraw
amaẓẓad
,
yakk
d
yiẓmi
yakked
d
isekna
n
tarda
ɣer
tullas
.

Yerna
tassast
tezmer
ad
teglu
i
wemdan
s
wuguren
niden
meqqren
am
wuguren
n
wul
neɣ
s
yifrayen
ur
nelhi
ara
ɣef
yiman-is
.


Tudert
n
wemdan
d
tin
i
d-issuturen
drus
n
tassast
,
acku
anecta
d
ayen
yelhan
i
tezmert
.

Anda
i
tettallel
deg
usgirrez
n
tmellit
tanaddalt
,
akken
i
tga
d
amgi
aseraɣ
i
ttaǧǧan
amdan
ad
yessezgi
w
ad
yennam
tawennaṭ-is
.


Arraz
n
Nobel
di
tekrura
:

n

di
tekrura
d
yiwen
seg

n

i
d-tettak
tkadimt
tageldant
i
tussniwin
n

i
yimusnawen
i
d-ifkan

.

.

Azday
aɣisan
:

aɣisan

.

iga
d

n

.

Dɣa

(

:

(

374
yerza
ɤer
yidurar

.

Telɣuɣa
n
umaḍal
n

n

2021
:
Telɣuɣa
n
umaḍal
n
irgazen
n
tcirfust
2021
Taẓrigt-a
tis
27
d
tin
aydeg
ara
ttekkint
aṭas
n
tmura
tuẓwirin
,
gar-asent
Danmaṛk
,
yellan
d
talɣuɣt
n
umaḍal
deg
telɣuɣa
taneggarut
,
Fṛansa
ay
irebḥen

sḍiset
n
tikkal
,

,

,
Lalman
,
Nuṛwij
,
Sswid
d
Pulunya
.

Timura-a
ay
yennummen
rebbḥent
ad
qablent
daɣ
ifnaten
d
uẓwiren
am
Brizil
,
Rrus
,
Island
,
Majaṛ
d
Maṣer
.

Danmaṛk
,
ay
irebḥen
talɣuɣa
n
2019
deffir
81
n
yiseggasen
n
tmeṛjiwt
,
ad
tettekki
deg
Tegrawt
D
,
yernu
ifnaten-nnes
,
mer
dani
,
ad
ilin
fessusit
fell-as
imi
ara
turar
mgal
Teṛjentint
,

d
Tegduda

n
Kungu
.

D
acu
kan
,
tagrawt
ara
d-ijebden
lwelha
d
Tagrawt
B
umi
semman
yimazzagen
«
tagrawt
n
tmettant
»
,
d
tin
aydeg

n

,

,

.

deg

At
Betrun
:
At
Betrun
(
s
Tafrensist
:
Aït
Betroun
neɣ
Aït
Bethroun
,
sTaɛrabt
:
بني
بترون
)
d
taqbilt
tamaziɣt
taqbaylit
n
zik
i
gesɛan
ukuz
(
4
)
n
leɛrac

:
At
Yenni
,
At
Wasif
,
At
Budrar
(
Ibudraren
)
d
Wat
Bu
Ɛekkac
"(
anẓul
n
taɣiwant
n
At
Wasif
)"
.

At
Betrun
kecmen
di
taqbilt
n
Yizwawen
,
zgan"-"d
deg
unẓul
agmuḍan
n
twilayt
n
Tizi
Wezzu
di
Tamurt
n
Leqbayel
,
Lezzayer
.

Nutni
d
inaragen
n
At
Mengellet
deg
ugmuḍ
,
n
At
Iraten
deg
ugafa
,
n
At
Sedqa
deg
utaram
,
ak
n
Yimceddalen
deg
unẓul
.

Ɣef
leḥsab
n
Charles
Devaux
,
ssawalen
i
yiman-sen
«
wul
n
yigawawen
»
,
qesḥen
deg
unni
n
leqwanen
nsen
.
""
Taqbilt
n
At
Betrun
tettwasen
s
tamguri
"(
ibeckiḍen
,
tikubiwin
.

.

.

)"
d
tinḍi
ines
"(
timeɣwanin
)"
.

Ɣur
At
Budrar
,
At
Wasif
,
ladɣa
At
Yenni
,
llan
aṭas
n
yimziren
i
lhan
,
tiḍni
nsen
taneblalt
.

At
Betrun
ttwasnen
daɣen
s
tasekkakt
di
lweqt
n
Yiɛutmaniyen""
.

Tamugri
nsen
nettat
i
meqren
uk
seg
Yizwawen
.

Tasnettit
.

At
Betrun
meɛnas
«
arraw
n
Betrun
»
,
At
Yenni
meɛnas
«
arraw
n
Yenni
»
.

Anezwar
Amaziɣ
«
Aït
»
meɛnas
«
arraw
n
—
»
,
ittwaxdam
i
tayvawt
,
maca
yezmer
ad
yili
meɛnas
«
widak
n
—
»
neɣ
«
medden
n
—
»
,
am
di
At
Wasif
,
meɛnas
«
medden/widak
n
tasift
»
,
At
Boudrar
,
meɛnas
«
medden/widak
n
wedrar
»
.

Anmezruy
ineslem
,
Ibn
Xeldun
,
ibder

s

taɛrabt

akka

:
Béni-Itroun
.

Iẓuran
.

Ɣef
leḥsab
n
unmezruy

n
lqern

,

,

Uremḍan
Krim
:
Uremḍan
Krim
"(
S
trumit
:
Ouramdane
Krim
)"
yettaru
ungalen
,
yettaru
isura
.

Tameddurt
.

Ilul
di
taddart
n
Tizra
Ɛisa
deg
At
Yeḥya
Musa
deg
useggas
n
1958
,
deg
iseggasen
ineggura
n
tegrawla
n
Lezzayer
.

Mbeɛd
mi
i
yeɣra
di
tesnawit
,
yekcem
ar
tkadimit
n
lɛesker
di
temdint
n
Cercal
,
dɣa
dinna
i
yuɣal
"sous-lieutenant"
Deg
useggas
n
1982
.

Deg
useggas
n
2009
,
yessufeɣ-d
ungal-ines
amezwaru
"wid
ur
nettwafham"
neɣ
s
unamek
nniḍen
"iɛeggunen!"
.

Uremḍan
Krim
d
netta
i
d
amezwaru
ad
y
arun
ungalan
deg
tamnaṭ
n
At
Yeḥya
Musa
.

Tamttant
.

Yemmut
di
27
Yennayer
2018
mbeɛd
mi
i
yeɣli
deg
waṭṭan
acḥal
d
aseggas
.

,

Ṛap
Aqvayli
:

Aqvayli
(
s
tefrensist

:
"Rap
Kabyle"
)
iwala
tafat
deg
iseggasen
n
2000
,
mbeεd
imi
i
d-tufrar
terbaεt
n
MBS
i
yeṭfen
amḍiq
s

di

n
cna
n

azzayri
.

Tarbaεt
n
MBS
(
"Le
Micro
Brise
Le
Silence"
)
ger
trebbuyaε
timezwura
n
rap
di
Lezzayer
,
xas
ulama
laṣel-nsen
d
aqbayli

,
acukan
cennun
s
teqbaylit
,
tefrensist
,
teglizit
,
tespanyulit
akked
d
Taɛrabt
tazzayrit
.

S
ccna-nsen
ifazen
,
uɣalen
mucaεen
ar
wid
isellen
i
ṣṣenf-agi
ger
iseggasen
n
1993
armi
d
2005
.

Ttwasnen
s
tyita-nsen
deg
udabu
azzayri
akked
ccna-nsen
s
teqbaylit
,
daya
i
ten-yeǧǧan
ad
twagedlen
di
ṛadyu
.

D
Sens
Interdit
i
d
tarbaεt
tamezwarut
n
rap
Aqvayli
i
d-yessufɣen
tasfift-nsen
tamezwarut
i
wumi
semman
"Kabyle"
"attaque
en
force"
,
i
d-tebεen
sin-nniḍen
,
"Notre
hip-hop"
(
2006
)
,
"Au
pays
des
interdits"
(
2014
)
,
akkan
daɣen
i
d-vanent
trebbuyaε-nniḍen
seg
2004
,
am
Index
,
l'as
des
as
,
BGLN
,
Gabonè
,
Le
General
,
Karim

,
Sofiane

,

,

,
mc
malik
.

daɣen

di

.

n
umigel
deg
twacult
n
tmigliwin
.

Asedger
(
Ideggan
n
tudert
)
.

Talmest-a
tettidir
deg
unẓul
utrim
n
Uruppa
(
Spanya
,
Portugal
,
Ǧibraltar
,
agafa
utrim
n
Ṭelyan
yakked
tegzirt
n
Sirdinya
.

i
tettidir
di

n
Ugafa
(

n
Umeṛṛuk
,
n
Lezzayer
,
n
Tunes
yakk
d
tmurt
n
Yiqbayliyen
.


Tiṭṭ
tuddist
:
Tiṭṭ
tuddist
d
yiwet
n
telmest
n
wallen
ilan
(
yesɛan
)
aṭas
n
tniltiyin
timzikin
timadasin
.

Allen
tuddisin
mgaradent
ɣef
wallen
ilan
yiwet
n
tlintit
am
wallen
n
yiselman
d
yigḍaḍ
d
wagla
n
temsuḍaḍ
s
umata
(
gar-asent
amdan
)
.

Dɣa
llant
snat
n
tegrawin
meqqren
ilan
allen
d
tuddisin
:
ibureɣsen
yakk
d
tiruca
(
am
tkureẓma
d
uẓeffun
)
.

Amḍan
n
tniltiyin
deg
wallen
tuddisin
iga
gar
n
ddaw
n
100
alamma
d
ugar
m
20
,000
deg

yemgaraden
n
iɣersiwen
,

tiniltit

d

n

seg
tmuski

.

deffir
n

,

seg

n

i

.

:

.

.

(

.

)

Taẓewt
n

:

n

(

ussnan
:

)
d

ɣef

,

.

n

,
gar-asent

ṭṭafarent

igamanen
.

Anaw
(
tasnudert
)
:
Anaw
di
tesnudert
d
tukkist
tufrizt
neɣ
deg
kra
n

d
tagrawt
n
tukkisin
seg
umuddir
iteqqnen
assaɣ
ussnan
ɣer
umuddir-a
s
talɣa
tamaddudt
.

Tukkist-a
tettili
d
amedya
yettarmen
ad
yezzulez
w
ad
iguccel
tifiras
itmeyyizen
tisurta-nni

.

Send
n

n
1900
,

yettumeggez
d

d
tukkist
.

Ma

d

ussnan
tessegraw

niḍen

(

)

.


Ixef
n

:
Ixef
n
usirem
agerram
(
s

tafrikant
:
"
Kaap
die
Goeie
Hoop"
)
d
yiwen
n

n
wakal
iwulan
i
ugaraw
anaṭlas
,

deg
unẓul
n
Tferka
zdat
n
temdint
n
Cape
Town
.

Talɣa-ines
tettemcabi
ixef
afensu
.

Zik-nni
llan
tekken-d
fellas
iɣerruba
imsenziyen
i

ɣer
neɣ
seg
Asya
.


Timziɣwawin
:
Timziɣwawin
(
Assaɣ
ussnan
:
Eukaryote
.

Si
tegrikt
:
«"ευ
-
eu
=
izil
,
ilha"»
yakked
«"κάρυον
-
karyon
=
aɣwaw"»
)
d
tagrawt
n
yimuddiren
ukrisen
,
ẓlin
(
ttumeyyzen
)
d
akken
tanga
tajinumt
yettilin
deg-sen
tessutel
deg
uɣwaw
ittuɣellfen
s
ufrar
,
ma
d
teɣratin-is
zzin-asen-d
yifraren
.

Timziɣwawin
tegber
seg
yimɣan

(

)
.

.

)

.

bṭan
s

telmest
n
yimɣan
isaɣuren
yeṭṭafaren
tawsit
n
tesmas
.

Aglam
.

Awecmim
d
yiwen
n

asnajjyan

,
tiddi-ines
tettali
seg
40
alamma
d

cm
.

:

:

)

.

teṭṭafar

.


Ideggan
n
wemɣay
.

deg

deg

,

d-tettemɣay

.


Ḥamas
:
Ḥamas
(
s
tserɣint
:
"حركة
المقاومة
الإسلامية"
,
s
usegzel
:
"حماس"
)
d
yiwen
n
umussin
ineslem
,
asunni
,
aɣerfan
aɣelnaw
n
Palistin
tzebbu
awanek
n
Israyil
d
tamhersa
tazyunist
,
akken
i
tga
d
amur
seg
umussu
aleslali
ineslem
,
amussu-a
yettamen
d
akken
taleslalit-a
i
d
anekcum
agejdan
i
yiswi-ines
igan
d
taslullit
n
Palistin
seg
wasif
n
Urdun
alamma
d
yilel
agrakal
.

Ḥamas
d
yiwen
seg
yiɣusal
n
Palistin
meqren
yakk
i
d-ttwasgensesen
deg
useqqamu
asentan
apalestinan
s
unect
n
tefranin
tisentanin
i
d-yellan
di
tmurt
n
Palistin
deg
useggas
n
2006
.

Iẓuran-is
d
inselmen
,
tgellem-d
iman-is
d
akken-itt
d
amussu
aslullan
aɣelnaw
ilan
tidmi
tineslemt
talemmast
tamnummest
,
armud-is
yettili-d
di
Palistin
kan
,
yerna
ur
tessekcam
ara

deg
tlufa
n
tmura
niḍen
.

:

neɣ

(

ussnan

,

)

,

Takerbust

:

(

,

Adrar
n
ufakan
:
Adrar
n
ufakan
(
s
Thibṛut
:
"הר
הבית"
,
"har
ha
Bayi"
)
d

uɣris

.

S
unect
n
wansayen
n
wudayen
,
din
i
yella
ibedd
ufakan
n
Uṛcalim
yettwadermen
deg

n
70
sɣur
n
umenkad
Titus
.

Amur

n
yiɣraben
ilaten
yessehrew-iten
Hirudus
i

ad

,

ad

amyiwen
i

Uṛcalim
w

n
unegger
.

,

n

Aggwa
:
Aggwa
neɣ
Aylal
d
irem
i
yettwanefken
i
yal
iyunen
yettemcabin
deg
iylanen
yettwaberzen
kan
s
unect
n
tmerniwt
neɣ
n
tdersi
n
tesmekta
.

S
umata
,
aggwa
isgensis-d
tehri
neɣ
aɣawas
i
tneẓẓi
i
uzenzar
(
izenzaren
izelɣanen
,
ifutunen
,
imesli
)
am
umḍafar
n
tesmekta
,
neɣ
tasmekta
n
umussu
neɣ
teɣzi
n
temdeswelt
neɣ
asnagar
neɣ
jean
tesmekta
niḍen
yettaken
assaɣ
.

Amedya
,
aggwa
n
tzelɣiwin
n
bita
isgensis-d
aẓuni
(
afraq
)
n
tfasa
tasintant
taliktṛunant
tibawt
n
waggay
i
d-ittfɣen
s
uwurman
seg
yinukliden
urmiden
n
izenzaren
.

Mi
ara
ad
yeglu
kra
n
uferdis
aṛadyurmid
s
tzelɣiwin
nAlfa
,
ad
fersent
aggwa
seg
tzelɣiwin
n
Alfa
ilan
yiwet
n
tfasa
neɣ
ugar
.


Taẓɣelt
tamellilt
:

.


Alkam
agejdan
:
Alkam
agejdan
di
tesnallunt
d
azlem
uddinan
n
yitran
issiliɣ-d
azal
n
80%
seg
yitran
yemgaraden
deg
umeɣrad
,
tessegraw-it-id
yiwet
n
twenɣa

,i
wakken
ad
t-ittessesmel
s
unect
n
yini
d
tedwast
n
usfijjej
.

Itran
n
welkem
agejdan
ttwassnen
s
akken
tafasa
n
usfijjej-nsen
d
tin
i
d-yekkan
seg
tsedmirt
n
wezday
aɣisan
n
uhidṛujin
deg
wul
n
yitri
,
dɣa
anecta
iga
d
snat
n
tsedmirin
n
wezday
aɣisan
i
d-igellun
s
[[Hilyum|uhilyum]
.

Tawenɣa
issegrawen
ger
n
tkura
n
yitri
d
yini
n
yini
waylal-is
d
tedwast
n
usfijjej-is
tettwasemma
s
usesmel
n
Hertzsprung–Russell
,
ma
d
tagrawt
n
yitran
n
ubaggus-a
di
twenɣa-ayi
tettwasemma
s
welkem
agejdan
,
acku
tessiliɣ-d
azal
n
80%
seg
telmas
n
yitran
yellan
deg
umeɣrad
.

Ma
d
isesmilen
n
yitran
yeffɣen
seg
ubaggus-a
agejdan
ssesmilen-d
20%
seg
yitran
n
umeɣrad
,
dɣa
ttemsegrawen-d
di
twenɣa
ɣef
sin
n
yibaggusen
niḍen
,
yerna
iglamen-nsen
mgaraden
s
waṭas
ɣef
yiglamen
n
yitran
n
welkem
agejdan
,
acku
asufeɣ-nsen
d
ufares-nsen
i
tfasa
yettuɣal
ɣer
tsedmirin
niḍen
anagar
azday
aɣisan
n
uhidṛujin
i
d-igellun
s
uhilyum
.

:

azeggaɣ
neɣ
Awezlan

,

.

n
3500°
C
,
lan
takura

n

(

ɣer
0
,075
seg

n

)
.

Yusef

:

Utalakakin

(

:

.

Julius
Caesar
:
Gaius
Julius
Qayser
(
Latina
:
"Gaius
Julius
Caesar"
)
(
100
BCE
-
44
BCE
)
d
nettat
ay
d
amezwaru
n
ugellid
Aṛuman
.

ilul
deg
100
BCE
.

Yettwaḥseb-it
d
yiwen
seg
isertayen
imeqranen
akk
deg
Roma
Tamezwarut
,
d
yiwen
seg
yigennalen
imeqranen
imeqranen
akk
deg
umezruy
n
umaḍal
.

Ula
d
netta
yettwassen
daɣen
ɣef
uxeddim-nnes
d
amasih
,
d
ameskari
ed
umezruy
.

Mi
yerbeḥ
imnaɣen-nnes
aserti
deg
yiwen
n
wemgaru
n
temdint
iweɛṛen
,
Qayser
yeḥkem
cwiṭ
akken
d
asertar
n
Roma
uqbel
ma
yenɣa-t
deg
44
BCE
.

Mi
d-yenɣa
tmenɣiwt-nnes
,
Usinat
Aṛuman
yewwi-d
asaḍuf
,
yeqqar-d
dakken
Qayser
yeqqel
d
Ṛebbi
.

Leḥsab
.

Aɛdaw
n
Qayser
ɣef
yisensanen
isertiyen
ed
yisɣanen
n
Roma
yella
yeɣtes
yerna
yeqqim
aṭas
.

Ass-a
,
axeddim-nnes
mazal-it
yessefhamen-d
iman-nnes
d
leɛjeb
ed
ukṛeh
.

Ma
yella
yebɣu
yili
,
medden
zemren
ad
d-ḍefren
tazmert
n
uxeddim
n
Qayser
deg
tefsirt
n
waṭas
n
temdinin
n
umaḍal
,
am
Fṛansa
ed
Yiwunak
Yeddukklen
.

Amezwaru
n
tanglizit
William
Shakespeare
,
yellan
yezdeɣ
deg
wass
n
Renaissance
,
yura-d
yiwen
n
wurar
ɣef
Qayser
isem-nnes
"Julius
Caesar"
.

Ugaɣ
,
urar-a
yeḍḍef
tilelli
igerrujen
d

seg
umezruy
n
tidet
.

:

n

,

(

,

.

am

,
Ḥmed
Ṣabiḥ
(

yemmut

)
Saɛid
u

,
Ɛebd-*Lḥaq

d
lquṭb
Ɛumar

,

.

Ma
di

.

:
195
418
d

n

(

Tamurt
n
Israyel
tella
tettnadi
ɣef
yimezdaɣ
imaynuten
ɣur-s
i
wakken
ad
teččar
d
udayen
sdat
yiɛraben
(
i
yellan
d
inselmen
neɣ
d
imasiḥiyen
i
yettalin
mliḥ
deg
umḍan
)
,
ihi
acḥal
aya

tella

udayen
iflacen
i
wakken
ad
ten-id
jmeɛ
ɣur-s
,

tamsalt
n
wunag
seg

ɣer

d
awezɣi
deg

n
uselway
n
yimiren

Haile
Mariam
.


Anḥaf-agi
i
ɣer
yuweḍ
udabu

ad

ɣef

agi
ad

akken

Isarazniyen
:

neɣ

Syin
yerna
deg
ulmud-is
ugar
.

Deg
Unbir
2018
yuɣal
yuli
akter
di
tṣeddarin-is
n
userdas
.

He
has
been
in
his
current
position
since
2005
,
and
since
then
has
been
interviewed
hundreds
of
times
on
various
Arab
television
channels
,
such
as
Al
Jazeera
.

Adraee
is
considered
a
familiar
figure
in
the
Arab
world
,
and
in
addition
to
his
activity
on
Arab
television
,
he
runs
accounts
on
social
media
.

Yeṭṭef
amḍiq-is
seg
useggas
n
2005
,
seg
yimiren
yeɛedda-d
ugar
n
yiwet
n
tikkelt
deg
waṭas
n
tiliẓriwat
tiɛrabin
.

Akka
am
tin
akk
yettwassnen
aṭas
:
Targa
n
Lǧazira
(
Al
Jazeera
)
.

Yuɣal
wudem
n
Aderɛi
yettwulef
sɣur
wid
yettabaɛen
isallen
deg

aɛrab
,

n

deg

n

.
